entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Central transitive pinning updates app.config but does not deploy dependencies #42608
  • Don't reference Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref for C++/CLI projects #42599
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload Sets] Running `dotnet workload restore` should install the workload set when using global.json #42582
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload Sets] With manifest mode and workload installed, Unhandled exception occurs when running `dotnet workload --info` using global.json #42581
  • Getting System.NullReferenceException when running `dotnet tool update -g --all` #42598

Closed

  • Generating satellite assemblies causes a lot of unnecessary work #38478
  • dotnet watch run (--) --no-restore tries to restore NuGet packages #40172
    9.0.1xx
  • Need option to optimize NuGetFallbackFolder contents for Docker/build server scenarios #9057
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [main] Enable the roslyn framework package only on C# and VB #42605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42601
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add regression test for TrimmerSingleWarn with PublishAot #42583
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Reenable test in GivenThatWeWantToRunILLink.cs #42580
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • *DO NOT MERGE* Test install-script.sh #42579
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • [Wasm] Fix request filters for blazor.boot.json #42607
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable specifying install search location options for published `apphost` #42455
    Area-Infrastructure, area-Host, untriaged
  • [Wasm] Moves wasm reload logic out of ASP.NET Core and into the SDK #42549
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Only publish artifacts on success #42574
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix .net 8.0 test templates #42585
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid downloading of Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset when building in dogfood environment #42552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #42546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2510744 #42570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42567
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI
